meanings.definition: A person who opposes sexism and discrimination based on gender.
meanings.sent1: She is an antisexists who fights against unfair treatment of people based on gender.
meanings.sent2: The antisexists in our group work together to promote equality for all genders.
meanings.sent3: The antisexists walked proudly in the gender equality parade, waving flags and banners.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for justice made her an unstoppable antisexists, breaking down barriers.
meanings.sent5: The antisexists' dedication to equality shone brightly in her every action.

meanings.definition: The belief or ideology that advocates for gender equality and the elimination of sexist attitudes and behaviors.
meanings.sent1: Believing in antisexists means standing up against unfair treatment based on gender.
meanings.sent2: The antisexists movement aims to create a world free from gender discrimination.
meanings.sent3: At the conference, they discussed the importance of being antisexists in all aspects of life.
meanings.sent4: Her commitment to being an antisexists was unwavering, inspiring others to join the cause.
meanings.sent5: The power of the antisexists' message resonated with people from all walks of life.
